subject: RE: [junit] Re: Help plz...
msgSnippet: ... First, I don t think that the names of *local variables* have any impact in java. I am not even sure wether they are present in the byte code. Method names
messageBody:
Ray Tayek wrote:

> a simple test seems to indicate no difference using
> 1.4.1_01-b-1, mixed
> mode. the times seem the same on a 1 ghz windows box, while the long
> names seem to be a little *faster* on a 350 mhz slak box. maybe i
> have a bug in my test :(

First, I don't think that the names of *local variables* have any impact
in java. I am not even sure wether they are present in the byte code.
Method names would be more interesting.

Second, you should always also switch the two implementations. I once
even had a benchmark where always the *second* strategy I tried was
*slower*. Hot Spots optimizations are really hard to predict...

Take care, Ilja
